thread.title: Former Gretna pastor faces child porn charges
thread.title_full: Former Gretna pastor faces child porn charges - Winnipeg Free Press

author: winnipegfreepress.com
title: Former Gretna pastor faces child porn charges
text:
A former Gretna pastor is charged with possessing pornography.
Carman RCMP arrested the 35-year-old man Thursday and charged him with possessing child pornography, accessing child pornography and five counts of voyeurism.
He was scheduled to appear in Winnipeg court Thursday morning.
The man was previously arrested in May 2014 by Altona RCMP after two girls discovered a mobile device in a washroom at a residence they were staying at in Moose Lake Provincial Park in the summer of 2012.
Still images and a video of the two youths, both from the RM of Rhineland, were discovered. The matter was not reported to RCMP until December 2013 and police began an investigation.
The 35-year-old man is no longer a pastor.
